inclusion.criterion: Patients with metastatic or locally advanced, unresectable HER2-positive breast cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: proven by clinical measures (i.e. standard imaging) in first line treatment (Locally
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: recurrent disease must not be amenable to resection with curative intent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who are eligible for treatment with trastuzumab plus chemotherapy or pertuzumab plus trastuzumab plus chemotherapy as first line therapy, administered intravenously in a three weekly frequency, according to each center's medical practice.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The first line anti-HER2 treatment must not have started more than 28 days before study entry.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No prior chemotherapy or HER2-directed therapy for metastatic or locally advanced disease, prior therapy for early breast cancer (eBC) is allowed
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Signed informed consent prior to onset of documentation.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who are not eligible for observation due to severe comorbidities or unavailability according to the treating physician
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has HER2-positive breast cancer and is eligible for treatment with trastuzumab plus chemotherapy. She does not have prior chemotherapy or HER2-directed therapy for metastatic or locally advanced disease.
